name: Adventurer

visualDescription.visibleClothing: Sturdy traveling clothes and a worn cloak

backstory: You are a wandering adventurer who has arrived in Emberhold seeking to make a name for yourself. You've heard tales of the village and its legendary forge, but now find yourself in the middle of a crisis as the sacred Ember Crystal has been stolen.
